name: Ian McKellen
info:
• 简体中文名: 伊恩·麦克莱恩
  • 别名: Ian Murray McKellen

  • 生日: 1939-05-25
  • 身高: 180cm
  • imdb_id: nm0005212
detail:
Ian Murray McKellen was born on May 25, 1939 in Burnley, Lancashire, England, to Margery Lois (Sutcliffe) and Denis Murray McKellen, a civil engineer.

He was appointed Knight Bachelor in the 1991 Queen's New Year Honours List for his services to drama.
